properties.description:
Left Fork Bouldering

The Left Fork has a high concentration of great areas. The Riverside area is by far the most popular due to the number of easier Bouldering problems. Parking can be an issue there since it's adjacent to the Big Joe area which also sees a lot of traffic.

New Joe's Bouldering Area

New Joe's is a hillside/canyon a few miles away from the Left and Right forks with a whole bunch of quality boulders. Area 51 is the most accessible and most popular area, but there is a lot more up there just a short walk away.
Generally 10 degrees cooler than climbs in the valley of left fork with afternoon shade. Comes with a great view and great landings. Rock quality is impeccable.
